#summary NVIDIA Texture Tools Roadmap

Here's a rough roadmap for the next releases of the NVIDIA Texture Tools:

= 2.0 =
== 2.0.3 ==

 * Most likely the last 2.0 bug fix release.

= 2.1 =

 * Branch creation expected by May 15th.

== 2.1.0 ==

Expected release date:

 * 2008/Q2 or quickly after the final CUDA 2.0 release.

Remaining features:

 * DXT1n support: [http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/issues/detail?id=21 Issue 21]
 * CTX1 support: [http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/issues/detail?id=21 Issue 21]
 * Support for floating point formats: [http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/issues/detail?id=27 Issue 27]
 * Support for different alpha modes: [http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/issues/detail?id=30 Issue 30]
 * Support for YCoCg color transform: [http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/issues/detail?id=18 Issue 18]
 * Use !FreeImage as primary image loading library: [http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/issues/detail?id=31 Issue 31]

Critical issues:

 * [http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/issues/detail?id=46 Issue 46]

= 2.2 =

Expected release date:

 * 2008/Q4

Features:

 * Experimental lower level interface.
 * Largely driven by developer demand and requests.


= 2.3 =

Expected release date:

 * 2009/Q2

Features:
 
 * Use CUDA driver interface: [http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/issues/detail?id=25 Issue 25]
 * Photoshop plugin: [http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/issues/detail?id=33 Issue 33]
